options.name: Take the Initiative
options.description: You are the first to act, often to set an example. Gain +1 skill with initiative. On the first round of combat, you gain a bonus dice to all your actions.

options.name: Natural Born Leader
options.description: You are born to lead and find it easy to get people to do your bidding. Gain +1 skill with the presence skill. Once per day, you can replace any persuasion check with a presence check.

options.name: Downtime Action : Rousing Speech
options.description: You spend time writing and performing a speech to either raise spirits or move someone to your opinion, with an audience suitable for your reputation. A presence check of 6-9 is midly successful, granting 5 temporary health to all who hear it. A check of 10 or higher is very successful and 10 temporary health and may be more likely to move others to your belief. In the event of a perfect check, all who hear become charmed by you for an hour or until it breaks naturally.

options.name: Action : To the Death
options.description: While at 0 health, you lead by example and show your bravery, rolling a presence check. You and all allies within a short (10 unit) radius gain temporary health equal to your check for the next minute.

options.name: Action : Rally
options.description: You attempt to rally your allies that can hear you to your position by calling out or blowing a horn. Until the start of your next turn, the movement speed of your allies is doubled when they are moving towards you or an enemy that you are adjacent to.

options.name: Proven Leader
options.description: Gain +1 talent with social and +1 skill with presence.

options.name: WIP
options.description: Allied characters gain a bonus dice to their resilience when they are within a short (10 units) radius of you.
